category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Pdf_viewer_preference
preference.preference_description: Determines the visibility of the "Print" and "Download" buttons in the pdf viewer panel of the Requirements Manager application in the Active Workspace client. Valid values are: * enablePrint: the "Print" button is displayed. * enableDownload: the "Download" button is displayed. The associated button will not be displayed either if no value is specified or if incorrect values are used.
